item.title: Color clicker
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

[code]program New;

const
ColorToClick = 26367; //Color to click here

var
x, y, w, h: Integer;

begin
GetClientDimensions(w, h);
repeat
repeat
Wait(10);
until(IsFKeyDown(2));
GetMousePos(x, y);
if FindColorSpiral(x, y, ColorToClick, 1, 1, w, h) then
begin
MoveMouseSmooth(x, y);
Wait(10);
ClickMouse(x, y, true);
WriteLn(‘Found color, clicked on it.’);
end else
WriteLn(‘Could not find color!’);

repeat
  Wait(10);
until(not (IsFkeyDown(2)));

until(IsFKeyDown(3));
end.[/code]

Fill out the const labeled ‘ColorToClick’ with the color to click, and press F2 to click the color, and F3 to end the script.

EDIT: Junior got to it first,

Read full topic

item.title: Color clicker
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

Is this something your lookin for? I made it for the site on the top and it works great, should be ok for what you are trying to ask for.

[scar]//bubble attack
//yes this script is pwnage…
//http://www.addictingclips.com/Clip.aspx?key=8B9BD3BA2BEA4D21&refCode=&brand=ag

program New;
var
x,y : integer;
const
time1=20;
color=13395660;

Procedure click;
Begin
If(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,color,0,0,400,266,5))Then
Begin
ClickMouse(x,y,True);
Wait(time1);
End;
End;

begin
ActivateClient;
Repeat
Click;
Until(IsFKeyDown(3))
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
